actions.name: Multiattack
actions.detail: Lord Karpathos uses two different maneuvers.

actions.name: Azure Lunge
actions.detail: Karpathos moves up to 15' before attacking. _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ 12 (2d6+5) slashing damage, plus 16 (3d10) lightning damage.

actions.name: Auric Cleave
actions.detail: Each creature in a 15' cone in front of Karpathos must make a [dc-primary] DEX save or take 16 (3d10) fire damage (half damage on save).

actions.name: Jade Parry
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ 12 (2d6+5) slashing damage, plus 16 (3d10) poison damage, and the target must make a [dc-secondary] STR save or have one item or weapon they're holding knocked out of their hands.

actions.name: Onyx Precision
actions.detail: On his next attack, Karpathos adds 1d8 to his attack roll, and 27 (5d10) acid damage to the damage roll.

actions.name: Silver Ultimatum
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ 12 (2d6+5) slashing damage, plus 16 (3d10) cold damage, and the target must make a [dc-secondary] WIS save or have disadvantage on attack rolls against all other targets until the end of Karpathos's next turn.

reactions.name: Counterattack
reactions.detail: When a creature attacks someone other than him, Karpathos can use his reaction to use Jade Parry against that creature.
